verbose_text: In order to confirm which signaling pathway (s) is/are involved in calcification as the upstream mediator of Runx2 expression, we examined the mRNA and protein expression levels of Runx2 and the protein expression of p-Smad1/5, p-Akt, p-ERK1/2 and beta-catenin in the CIM+ cells in comparison to that observed in the CIM-cells and the cells on day 0.
